revised_title: Supplementary Memoir on Caustics and Anniversary Meeting
tldr: The author discusses a supplementary memoir on caustics, specifically focusing on the sextic curve, which is the general secondary caustic or orthogonal trajectory of parallel rays reflected at a circle. The Anniversary Meeting of the Royal Society is also reported, covering topics such as the Society's accommodation, the Catalogue of Scientific Papers, and the re-organization of the Meteorological Department of the Board of Trade.
